arrow.description: Whether the arrows in the drop-down box are displayed

destroyPopupOnHide.description: Whether to destroy the dropdown after it is closed

disabled.description: menu whether or not to disable

:getPopupContainer.description: The menu renders the parent node. By default, it is rendered to the body, and if you're having trouble scrolling the menu, try modifying the scrolling area and positioning it relative to it.
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位。

overlayClassName.description: Drop-down the class name of the root element

:overlayStyle.description: Drop-down the style of the root element

placement.type: bottomLeft | bottom | bottomRight | topLeft | top | topRight

trigger.description: Triggers the behavior of pulling down, and the mobile terminal does not support hover
trigger.description_zh: 触发下拉的行为, 移动端不支持 hover

events.name: openChange
events.description: The menu is called when the display status changes, and the parameter is visible. Disappearances caused by clicking the menu button will not trigger
events.description_zh: 菜单显示状态改变时调用，参数为 visible。点击菜单按钮导致的消失不会触发
